flawed_nl_solution:
Two-fifths of 1000 players is (2/5)*1000 = <<(2/5)*1000=5000/2>>5000/2 players
Three eights of 1000 players is (3/8)*1000 = <<(3/8)*1000=375>>375 players
The total number of players 25 or older is 5000/2+375 = <<5000/2+375=2875>>2875
The number of players younger than 25 years is 1000-2875 = <<1000-2875=-1875>>-1875 players
#### -1875

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 400, not 5000/2. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
